sentence: I awoke this morning with a both sharp and dull pain around my left shoulder, close to the spine.
I have just began to experience severe pains in my lower knee.
For 2 days now I've had stiffness in my neck.
The pain begins as a dull, lasting sensation throughout the upper middle of my back but is not limited to this area.

I have three hard bumps on the back of my neck in different areas.
Every morning I wake up with back pain so intense that I am unable to move for the first 10-15 minutes.
I have a lower back pain problem.
Hello I was working out about a month and a half ago and my lower back started to accutely hurt.
I suffer with bad back and shoulder pains.

When I lay down to sleep I get this stabbing sensation in the middle of my back.
Pain is primarily in mid buttock.

One morning while driving I noticed a pain in my left shoulder blade.
I have, for the past 10 days, been experiencing pain across my mid back.

I have this pain and tenderness in my thoracic spine 6 months.

Whenever I press my left shoulder blade I get a kind of sharp pain.
